title: Burt's Bees Pomegranate & Soy Shampoo, 12-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 2)
description: Transform fine, flat, lifeless hair into thick and voluminous hair with extra body. Pomegranate blended with natural cleansers made from coconut and sunflower oils cleanses gently, removing buildup, while soy amino acids adhere to hair fibers to lift and separate hair, leaving it soft, shiny and full of volume.

title: Yes To Calming Facial Mask, Cucumber, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: Yes To Cucumbers calming facial mask gives your tired skin that gentle moisture boost you've been searching for, leaving your sensitive skin soft, silky, and polished to perfection! Going green isn't just a trend, it's an important way of life! And what better way to start going green, than with something everyone will recognize - your beautiful face!

title: Duffy's Brew Original Beer Shampoo - 8oz
description: Duffy's Brew Original Beer Shampoo uses the nourishing benefits from Elysian Brewing Company's Dragonstooth Stout to strengthen and revitalize your hair and scalp. The bitter Cascade and Centennial hops, roasted barley, and rich malt found in this beer provide a restorative coat of vitamin B, proteins, and minerals to each strand, adding volume and body to your hair. The maltose and sucrose used in the brewing process also tighten your hair's cuticles for enhanced shine.

title: NaturOli Soft & Soothing Body Lotion - Olivander® Scent - All Natural - 8 oz with Lotion Pump - Made in USA!
description: Finally a highly effective, deep moisturizinglotionthat leaves no oily, sticky or greasy film. Superb for those working on a keyboard, in the medical profession, or handling papers and products!Superb for hand and facial use. While repairing and locking in moisture, our Body Lotion fortifies your skin's natural barriers and helps shield your body from harmful environmental elements. Intended for frequent use, it is specially formulated (enhanced with Squalene and Olive Leaf Extract) to include an abundance of rich, healthy ingredients while absorbing astonishingly fast and very deepHighly effective in moisturizing and replenishment of needed nutrients plus providing additional antioxidant protection.Helps skin retain its healthy, elastic properties, leaving your skin soft, supple, and more youthful. A wonderfully smooth, silky vitamin-rich lotion.Indulge and be pampered.NaturOli is a proud Signer and "CHAMPION" of the Environmental Working Group and Skin Deep's "Safety in Cosmetics Campaign".
